name: Countdown (itch) (wormytables)
description:
From the Ludum Dare 51 Game Jam theme: Every 10 Seconds

You have 10 seconds to defuse the bomb, live die repeat.

Hints?

Each defusal method requires some kind of input - you must find that input.
Each time it explodes the things don't MOVE but they do change.
Each thing interacted with costs a second, including the defusing.

More Hints?

Screw panel: Find screwdriver, find the pattern (one screw is booby trapped)
Code panel: Find the code around the room
Twisty thing: Find the sequence around the room
3 Wires: Find cutters, find hints around the room for which to cut
Magnetic Lock: Find appropriate batteries
Chemicals: find or mix the right coloured chemical

And don't forget, when it explodes the codes may change, but the locations of the codes don't!
